text.p: Our goal is to show that the columns of [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] are linearly independent. This desired conclusion is equivalent to which of the following?

font.p: We know that [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] is the standard matrix for the transformation [mathjaxinline]T\circ S[/mathjaxinline]. Thus, the columns of [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] are linearly independent if and only if [mathjaxinline]\text {Ker}(T\circ S)=\{ \mathbf{0}\}[/mathjaxinline] if and only if [mathjaxinline]T\circ S[/mathjaxinline] is into.
